snippet: A federal judge in Brooklyn said that, despite recent progress, the Fire Department had not committed enough time or resources to reverse a long history of discrimination.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Brooklyn said that, despite recent progress, the Fire Department had not committed enough time or resources to reverse a long history of discrimination.

headline.main: New York Fire Dept. Has Not Done Enough to Recruit Minorities, Judge Finds
headline.print_headline: Fire Dept. Has Not Done Enough to Recruit Minorities, Judge Finds
headline.seo: Fire Dept. Has Not Done Enough to Recruit Minorities, Judge Finds
